description: This program will flatten a surface patch

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Write out the surface every # of iterations.

distances.title: Distances
distances.description: Specify size of neighborhood and number of vertices at each distance to be used in the optimization.

dilations.title: Dilations
dilations.description: Specify the number of times to dilate the ripped edges to ensure a clean cut

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Set the random seed to a specific value so that flattening is repeatable

copy_coords.title: Copy Coords Surface
copy_coords.description: Copy xyz coords from surface before flattening.

norand.title: No Random Seed Flag
norand.description: Set the random seed to 0 so that flattening is repeatable
